abstract: Americans Thomas J. Sargent and Christopher A. Sims win the Nobel price in economic science for their empirical research on cause and effect of government policies on the broader economy.
snippet: Thomas J. Sargent and Christopher A. Sims, two Americans, won the Nobel economics prize on Monday “for their empirical research on cause and effect in the macroeconomy.”
lead_paragraph: Thomas J. Sargent and Christopher A. Sims, two Americans, won the Nobel economics prize on Monday “for their empirical research on cause and effect in the macroeconomy.”

headline.main: 2 American Professors Awarded Nobel in Economic Science
headline.print_headline: 2 American Professors Are Awarded the Nobel in Economic Science
